movies.title: Gossos
movies.plot: Victor loses his job as a result of a work accident and is to be given a permanent disability pension. From then on, his life and relationship with his wife, Gloria, slowly deteriorates. The situation is made worse by the arrival of Gloria's sister, Eva. Victor is totally affected by his sister-in-law and her presence is the last straw, driving Victor into a spiral of violence and harassment that the two women are not able to stop. Eva and Gloria become convinced that Victor may end up killing them unless they do something about it.
movies.simplePlot: Victor loses his job as a result of a work accident and is to be given a permanent disability pension. From then on, his life and relationship with his wife, Gloria, slowly deteriorates. ...

biography.bio: Lluís Homar was born on April 20, 1957 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Lluís Homar Toboso. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Broken Embraces (2009), Bad Education (2004) and Les yeux de Julia (2010).
biography.name: Lluís Homar

biography.placeOfBirth: Sant Cugat del Vallès, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain
biography.bio: Emma Vilarasau was raised in Sant Cugat de Vallès, Spain. In 1980 she completed her studies at l'Institut del Teatre de la Diputació de Barcelona and went on to further her knowledge in seminars and other courses with figures like Strasberg or Gandolfo. A good part of her career is linked with the Teatre Lliure company, but she also played at other places. Emma's career took a turn when she played the role of Eulàlia Montsolís in TV3 series, called Nissaga de Poder (Dynasty of Power). She became one of the most popular actresses in Catalonia. In 1999 she made her fist movie as a protagonist named Los Sin Nombre (The Nameless). In 2000 she was back to the stage again with the role of Blanche Dubois in the play A Streetcar Named Desire. She is one of the best actresses in Catalan theatre today.
biography.name: Emma Vilarasau

biography.bio: Laura Conejero was born on September 8, 1966 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. She is an actress, known for La Riera (2010), Ventdelplà (2005) and Mar de fons (2006).
biography.name: Laura Conejero

biography.bio: Francesc Garrido is an actor, known for The Sea Inside (2004), Apartment 143 (2011) and The Uninvited Guest (2004).
biography.name: Francesc Garrido

biography.bio: Blanca Apilánez was born in Vitoria, Álava, País Vasco, Spain. She is an actress, known for L'étrangère (2010), Libertarias (1996) and La pasión turca (1994).
biography.name: Blanca Apilánez

biography.bio: Gerard Grassa is an actor, known for Gossos (2002), Plats bruts (1999) and L'un per l'altre (2003).
biography.name: Gerard Grassa

biography.bio: Glòria Roig was born on December 18, 1937 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Glòria Roig i Fransitorra. She is known for her work on L'éducation d'une fée (2006), Reivindicació de la senyora Clito Mestres (1992) and Goomer (1999). She was married to José Luis Sansalvador. She died on February 15, 2008 in Barcelona.
biography.name: Glòria Roig

biography.bio: Al Victor is an actor and director, known for Bruc, the Manhunt (2010), El aliento del diablo (1993) and In Praise of Older Women (1997).
biography.name: Al Victor

biography.bio: Miquel Gelabert was born in 1954 in Felanitx, Balearic Islands, Spain as Miquel Gelabert Bordoy. He is an actor, known for Ventdelplà (2005), The Body (2012) and El Greco (2007).
biography.name: Miquel Gelabert

biography.bio: Manel Gener is an actor, known for Gossos (2002), Temps de silenci (2001) and Porca misèria (2004).
biography.name: Manel Gener

biography.bio: Montserrat Gausachs is an actress, known for Costa Brava (1995), Julia Berkowitz (2004) and The Hours of the Day (2003).
biography.name: Montserrat Gausachs

biography.bio: Víctor Pi is an actor, known for Escrito en la piel (1995), The Dutchman's Island (2001) and Sinatra (1988).
biography.name: Víctor Pi

biography.bio: Paca Barrera was born in Motril, Granada, Spain. She is known for her work on What's It All About (1995), Barcelona (1994) and Abracadaver (2013).
biography.name: Paca Barrera

biography.bio: Romualdo Sánchez is an actor, known for Gossos (2002) and El cor de la ciutat (2000).
biography.name: Romualdo Sánchez

biography.bio: Ramón Vall is an actor, known for Visions d'un estrany (1991), Laberint d'ombres (1998) and Gossos (2002).
biography.name: Ramón Vall
